ygData.subject: Re: Bear Hide Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: To get armour you must first hail her in name of her brother and then you must have a faction with karana residens high ! Other thing to be careful about is
ygData.messageBody:
To get armour you must first hail her in name of her brother and then you
must have a faction with karana residens high ! Other thing to be careful
about is quality of skeens what you give to her. Hmm anyone knows if she
accepts platinun or i can pay only with gold. It is anoying to have all
time all thet gold on you i have been there and as i have only plat i
midded ocasion to buy all armours.

Anyone know where to find Krag in ice lands i nearly finished stumped by
giants searching for him. !






At 11.25 27/06/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
>
>I have tried to get bear hide belt and boots from Chandra Miller twice, but
>she just takes my money and bear pelts, and says something like "Oh thank
>you, but I still need the other thing". Has anyone gotten the boots and
>belt from her (I already have a polar bear cloak so don't need the bear
>hide cloak)? Talking to her is not the problem, she tells me what she needs
>to make the stuff. Thanks.
>
>Greg (Kronan)
